column4: is there a command to kill X (and keep it from restarting, I need to install the nVidia driver from a terminal)?
ctl-alt-f2, login & run sudo invoke-rc.d gdm stop , then do your nvidia stuff.  sudo invoke-rc.d gdm start to restart the gui
also, you can switch between gui and that fancy console with clt-alt-f2 and ctl-alt-f7 anytime
